channel.title: NULLS......With Items

item.title: NULLS......With Items
item.dc:creator: @Play_For_Keeps Play For Keeps
item.description:
@Play_For_Keeps wrote:

I just downloaded a new client and it came with a item.cfg…the only thing I’ve done so far is replaced my item.cfg with this one. And then I made a new ::pickup command. That’s all I’ve done

And whenever I type a ::pickup command for any of these I just get a dwarf’s head and its name is “null.” But when I pickup a fighter helmet it works, until I put it in the bank…then it turns into ‘evil dave’

Anything I’m doing wrong?

My Pickup command:

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 2)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)); if (newItemID <= 20000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! "); } }

How I fix this so that I have working skillcapes and what-not instead of nulls?

Read full topic
